Andy Coulson played a considerable part in steadying the Tory boat, writes Matthew d'Ancona . Matthew d'Ancona 8:40 AM GMT 24 Jan 2011 Do us a favour, mate," my lunch guest said. If I go mad in Number 10, come and kill me with a big hammer.
